wikipedia.title: Economic inequality
wikipedia.summary: Economic inequality is the difference found in various measures of economic well-being among individuals in a group, among groups in a population, or among countries.

news.title: Opinion | Libertarianism vs. meritocracy
news.summary: The American Dream is a meritocratic ideal. Our national ethos is that no one should be guaranteed prosperity, but all citizens should have an equal opportunity to pursue it through their merit.
